text:
In Ph1 #ClinicalTrials, #CloverBiopharma’s #COVID19 S-trimer vaccine offers 100% #seroconversion in adults; 88-100% in the #elderly

#Vaccine, stable at 2-8° C, #adjuvanted w/ @GSK’s #pandemic system or @DynavaxCorp’s CpG 1018 plus alum
